title: Fix Map control so that it is possible to databind/add multiple objects in Universal apps with reasonable performance
body: When you add items to the map and then pan the map the items aren't following the map but are lagging behind.

comments.body:
This API was available in Silverlight:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/microsoft.phone.maps.controls.mappolyline.strokecolorproperty

Today I can't instantiate a Mappolygon in an ItemControl from XAML.
With the PhoneToolkit I can Instantiate polygons or other UI with an template that I can give to my more artistic gifted friends for making my map symbols stylish.
But not the Mappolygon which is sad as I want to draw tracks and other information that is based on lat/long coordinates and want them to be drawn on the map as they used to in bing maps.
